nodes.text: The Hutt Council records were an incriminating Hutt document that fell into the possession of the Hutt Ziro. This led the Grand Hutt Council to target him, as this holodiary contained information on the criminal dealings of the entire Grand Hutt Council. For possessing the document, Ziro was killed by Sy Snootles, working through Jabba, who later returned the document to him.
